sources.title: Apache Iceberg Table Maintenance and Optimization
sources.synthesis: Iceberg compaction reduces small files and improves query performance. Expire snapshots reclaims storage. Bloom filters accelerate lookups.

sources.title: Parquet Compression Benchmarks: ZSTD vs Snappy vs GZIP
sources.synthesis: ZSTD level 3-5 achieves best compression/speed tradeoff. 60-70% compression ratio with minimal CPU overhead.

sources.title: Bloom Filters for Database Systems
sources.synthesis: Bloom filters reduce disk I/O for point lookups. 1% false positive rate is optimal for analytical workloads.
